title: Lamb cutlets marinated with spiced dates and sultanas
description: This recipe requires quite a few specialist spices, but you won’t be disappointed with Indian-inspired marinated lamb served with green chutney and kachumber salad.
ingredients: 1 tsp cumin and black cumin powder mixed 50:50
100g/3½oz strained yoghurt (strain your yogurt in a sieve lined with muslin for a few hours to get rid of excess moisture)
about 5 tbsp strained yoghurt (strain your yogurt in a sieve lined with muslin for a few hours to get rid of excess moisture)
¼ cucumber, peeled, cut into 1cm/½in dice
